document_data.mainbody:
he Ice Star is an enchanted morning star that was once carried by Gromnir Il-Khan. Its head is forged from unbreakable ice-like crystal. Besides of its substantial enhancement bonus, it grants fire resistance and does extra cold damage.
*
CategoryMagic items
CategoryMorning stars
categoryPlus-4 items
